languages.text: "Мое желание — я хочу, чтобы все выпили за мою фортуну. Она уже сделала мне царский подарок — это я о вас, шерин. Пусть она будет столь же милостива ко мне и впредь!" {n}Все за столом дружно поднимают кубки. Вы тоже — прежде, чем сами поняли. На столе вас уже ожидает новая стопка плиток... Вы ловите себя на том, что некоторые мгновение проскакивают мимо вашей памяти. Похоже, амасек несколько крепче, чем кажется на первый взгляд.{/n}

"And for my wish — I want everyone to drink to my good fortune. It has already granted me a gift fit for a queen — I'm talking about you, shereen. May fortune continue to smile upon me!" {n}Everyone at the table eagerly raises their glasses. You join in before you even are aware you have done so. A new stack of tiles is already waiting for you on the table... You realise that moments have skipped past without your knowing. It seems the amasec is somewhat stronger than you thought.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мое желание — я хочу, чтобы все выпили за мою фортуну. Она уже сделала мне царский подарок — это я о вас, шерин. Пусть она будет столь же милостива ко мне и впредь!" {n}Все за столом дружно поднимают кубки. Вы тоже — прежде, чем сами поняли. На столе вас уже ожидает новая стопка плиток... Вы ловите себя на том, что некоторые мгновение проскакивают мимо вашей памяти. Похоже, амасек несколько крепче, чем кажется на первый взгляд.{/n}

May fortune continue to smile upon me!" {n}Everyone at the table eagerly raises their glasses. You join in before you even are aware you have done so. A new stack of tiles is already waiting for you on the table... You realise that moments have skipped past without your knowing. It seems the amasec is somewhat stronger than you thought.{/n}

languages.text: “至于我的愿望嘛，我希望所有人都能举杯，为我的好运干杯。命运已经赐予了我无比美妙的礼物，那就是你，亲爱的。愿好运继续常伴我左右。”{n}餐桌边的每个人都迫不及待地举起了酒杯，你也下意识地举起了酒杯，加入了祝酒的行列。随后，一叠新的牌摆在了桌上，等待着你……你猛然发现，时间不知不觉地匆匆流逝。看来，这艾玛赛克酒的酒劲，比你想象得要更厉害些。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And for my wish — I want everyone to drink to my good fortune. It has already granted me a gift fit for a queen — I'm talking about you, shereen. May fortune continue to smile upon me!" {n}Everyone at the table eagerly raises their glasses. You join in before you even are aware you have done so. A new stack of tiles is already waiting for you on the table... You realise that moments have skipped past without your knowing. It seems the amasec is somewhat stronger than you thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “至于我的愿望嘛，我希望所有人都能举杯，为我的好运干杯。命运已经赐予了我无比美妙的礼物，那就是你，亲爱的。愿好运继续常伴我左右。”{n}餐桌边的每个人都迫不及待地举起了酒杯，你也下意识地举起了酒杯，加入了祝酒的行列。随后，一叠新的牌摆在了桌上，等待着你……你猛然发现，时间不知不觉地匆匆流逝。看来，这艾玛赛克酒的酒劲，比你想象得要更厉害些。{/n}

languages.text: 「そしてあたしの願いは…みんなにあたしの幸運を祝ってもらえること。なんせ、すでに女王にふさわしい贈り物は受け取ってるからね…あんたのことさ、シャリーン。幸運が私に微笑み続けますように！」{n}テーブルの全員が熱心にグラスを掲げる。自分でも気づかないうちに、あなたもそれに加わる。新しいタイルの束がすでにテーブルの上であなたを待っている…知らないうちに時間が過ぎていたことに気づく。アマセックは思ったより強いようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And for my wish — I want everyone to drink to my good fortune. It has already granted me a gift fit for a queen — I'm talking about you, shereen. May fortune continue to smile upon me!" {n}Everyone at the table eagerly raises their glasses. You join in before you even are aware you have done so. A new stack of tiles is already waiting for you on the table... You realise that moments have skipped past without your knowing. It seems the amasec is somewhat stronger than you thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そしてあたしの願いは…みんなにあたしの幸運を祝ってもらえること。なんせ、すでに女王にふさわしい贈り物は受け取ってるからね…あんたのことさ、シャリーン。幸運が私に微笑み続けますように！」{n}テーブルの全員が熱心にグラスを掲げる。自分でも気づかないうちに、あなたもそれに加わる。新しいタイルの束がすでにテーブルの上であなたを待っている…知らないうちに時間が過ぎていたことに気づく。アマセックは思ったより強いようだ。{/n}

languages.text: «En cuanto a mi deseo, quiero que todo el mundo beba por mi buena fortuna. Ya me ha dado un regalo digno de una reina: usted, shereen. ¡Que la fortuna me siga sonriendo!». {n}Todos en la mesa levantan las copas. Te unes a ellos sin darte cuenta de lo que haces. Un nuevo montón de fichas te espera sobre la mesa... te das cuenta de que el tiempo pasa sin que seas consciente de ello. Parece que el amasec es más potente de lo que esperabas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And for my wish — I want everyone to drink to my good fortune. It has already granted me a gift fit for a queen — I'm talking about you, shereen. May fortune continue to smile upon me!" {n}Everyone at the table eagerly raises their glasses. You join in before you even are aware you have done so. A new stack of tiles is already waiting for you on the table... You realise that moments have skipped past without your knowing. It seems the amasec is somewhat stronger than you thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a mi deseo, quiero que todo el mundo beba por mi buena fortuna. Ya me ha dado un regalo digno de una reina: usted, shereen. ¡Que la fortuna me siga sonriendo!». {n}Todos en la mesa levantan las copas. Te unes a ellos sin darte cuenta de lo que haces. Un nuevo montón de fichas te espera sobre la mesa... te das cuenta de que el tiempo pasa sin que seas consciente de ello. Parece que el amasec es más potente de lo que esperabas.{/n}

languages.text: « Quant à mon souhait... je veux que tout le monde trinque à ma chance. J'ai déjà reçu un cadeau digne d'une reine ; je parle de vous, shereen. Puisse le sort continuer à me sourire ! » {n}Autour de la table, tout le monde lève son verre de bon cœur. Vous vous joignez à eux sans même vous en rendre compte. Devant vous, une nouvelle pile de tuiles vous attend déjà et vous comprenez que plusieurs secondes vous ont échappé à votre insu. Cet amasec doit être plus corsé que vous le pensiez.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And for my wish — I want everyone to drink to my good fortune. It has already granted me a gift fit for a queen — I'm talking about you, shereen. May fortune continue to smile upon me!" {n}Everyone at the table eagerly raises their glasses. You join in before you even are aware you have done so. A new stack of tiles is already waiting for you on the table... You realise that moments have skipped past without your knowing. It seems the amasec is somewhat stronger than you thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quant à mon souhait... je veux que tout le monde trinque à ma chance. J'ai déjà reçu un cadeau digne d'une reine ; je parle de vous, shereen. Puisse le sort continuer à me sourire ! » {n}Autour de la table, tout le monde lève son verre de bon cœur. Vous vous joignez à eux sans même vous en rendre compte. Devant vous, une nouvelle pile de tuiles vous attend déjà et vous comprenez que plusieurs secondes vous ont échappé à votre insu. Cet amasec doit être plus corsé que vous le pensiez.{/n}

languages.text: "Und was meinen Wunsch angeht – ich möchte, dass alle auf mein Glück trinken. Eigentlich hat es mir schon ein Geschenk gemacht, das einer Königin würdig ist – ich spreche von Euch, Shereen. Möge mir das Glück auch weiterhin hold sein!" {n}Anschließend erhebt jeder am Tisch sein Glas. Auch du stimmst mit ein, bevor es dir überhaupt bewusst wird. Ein neuer Stapel mit Spielsteinen wartet auf dem Tisch bereits auf dich ... Du stellst fest, dass du die letzten Momente vergessen hast. Der Amasec scheint doch etwas stärker zu sein, als du erst dachtest.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And for my wish — I want everyone to drink to my good fortune. It has already granted me a gift fit for a queen — I'm talking about you, shereen. May fortune continue to smile upon me!" {n}Everyone at the table eagerly raises their glasses. You join in before you even are aware you have done so. A new stack of tiles is already waiting for you on the table... You realise that moments have skipped past without your knowing. It seems the amasec is somewhat stronger than you thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und was meinen Wunsch angeht – ich möchte, dass alle auf mein Glück trinken. Eigentlich hat es mir schon ein Geschenk gemacht, das einer Königin würdig ist – ich spreche von Euch, Shereen. Möge mir das Glück auch weiterhin hold sein!" {n}Anschließend erhebt jeder am Tisch sein Glas. Auch du stimmst mit ein, bevor es dir überhaupt bewusst wird. Ein neuer Stapel mit Spielsteinen wartet auf dem Tisch bereits auf dich ... Du stellst fest, dass dir die letzten Momente vergessen hast. Der Amasec scheint doch etwas stärker zu sein, als du erst dachtest.{/n}

languages.text: "Gelelim dileğime... Herkesin güzel talihim için kadeh kaldırmasını istiyorum. Talihim bana kraliçelere layık bir armağan bahşetti bile. Senden bahsediyorum şirinim. Talih kuşu bana gülümsemeye devam etsin!" {n}Masadaki herkes, hevesle kadeh kaldırıyor. Daha farkına varamadan sen de onlara katılıyorsun. Masada seni yeni bir karo grubu bekliyor. Zamanın çok çabuk geçtiğini fark ediyorsun. Amasek, sandığından daha güçlü çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And for my wish — I want everyone to drink to my good fortune. It has already granted me a gift fit for a queen — I'm talking about you, shereen. May fortune continue to smile upon me!" {n}Everyone at the table eagerly raises their glasses. You join in before you even are aware you have done so. A new stack of tiles is already waiting for you on the table... You realise that moments have skipped past without your knowing. It seems the amasec is somewhat stronger than you thought.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ve dileğim: Herkesin güzel talihim için kadeh kaldırmasını istiyorum. Talihim bana kraliçelere layık bir armağan bahşetti bile. Senden bahsediyorum şirinim. Talih kuşu bana gülümsemeye devam etsin!" {n}Masadaki herkes hevesle kadeh kaldırıyor. Daha bunu yaptığını bile fark edemeden sen de onlara katılıyorsun. Masada seni yeni bir grup karo bekliyor. Zamanın sen fark edemeden geçtiğini fark ediyorsun. Amasek sandığından daha güçlüymüş gibi gözüküyor.{/n}
